name: Dolan Reborn
storyline: to pin point where the person responsible for this is. In this journey you will encounter difficult obstacles, enemies and bosses so do your best to get to the final act.
summary: In Dolan Reborn, random people are disappearing all over, and it's up to you to stop that. Take control of Dolan and go to various locations to pinpoint the person responsible for this. In this journey, you will encounter difficult obstacles, enemies, and bosses so do your best to get to the final act.
